languages.text: "Я оставлю Анатомическую оперу и ретируюсь в шпиль кабала Опустошительной бури. Под оком моих покровителей ведьмы не посмеют сводить счеты и лишать их ценного слуги. А ты... Ступай на улицы Прорвы и умри. Или ступай на арену и попытайся убить Кикеросс. И даже в случае успеха — все равно умри".

"I will leave the Anatomical Opera and withdraw to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The Wyches won't dare to settle their scores under the eye of my patrons, so the Kabal's valuable servant is safe from their ire. As for you... Go out into the streets of the Chasm and die. Or go to the arena and try to kill Keykeross. Even if you succeed, you will still die."
languages.original_text: "Я оставлю Анатомическую оперу и ретируюсь в шпиль кабала Опустошительной бури. Под оком моих покровителей ведьмы не посмеют сводить счеты и лишать их ценного слуги. А ты... Ступай на улицы Прорвы и умри. Или ступай на арену и попытайся убить Кикеросс. И даже в случае успеха — все равно умри".

traits.locale_text: "I am leaving the Anatomical Opera and withdrawing to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The Wyches won't dare to settle their scores right under the eye of my patrons, so the Kabal's valuable servant will be safe from their ire. As for you... Go out into the streets of the Chasm and die. Or go to the arena and try to kill Keykeross. Even if you succeed, die anyway."

Or go to the arena and try to kill Keykeross. Even if you succeed, you will still die."

languages.text: « Je vais quitter l'Opéra anatomique et me retirer dans la tour de la Tempête ravageuse. Les Cérastes n'oseront pas régler leurs comptes sous les yeux de mes mécènes, le serviteur de la Kabale dévoué que je suis devrait donc être à l'abri. Quant à vous... vous n'avez qu'à vous rendre dans les rues de l'Abîme pour vous y faire massacrer. Ou rendez-vous dans l'arène pour tenter de tuer Keykeross. Mais même si vous y parvenez, vous mourrez tout de même. »
languages.original_text: "I will leave the Anatomical Opera and withdraw to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The Wyches won't dare to settle their scores under the eye of my patrons, so the Kabal's valuable servant is safe from their ire. As for you... Go out into the streets of the Chasm and die. Or go to the arena and try to kill Keykeross. Even if you succeed, you will still die."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais quitter l'Opéra anatomique et me retirer dans la tour de la Tempête ravageuse. Les Cérastes n'oseront pas régler leurs comptes sous les yeux de mes mécènes, le serviteur de la Kabale dévoué que je suis devrait donc être à l'abri. Quant à vous... vous n'avez qu'à vous rendre dans les rues de l'Abîme pour vous y faire massacrer. Ou rendez-vous dans l'arène pour tenter de tuer Keykeross. Mais même si vous y parvenez, vous mourrez tout de même. »

languages.text: “我打算离开解剖歌剧院，撤回狂风阴谋团的尖塔。巫灵教派的人不敢在我的庇护主眼皮底下算账。我是狂风阴谋团的重要仆人，我不会遭到他们的袭击。至于你……你就去裂隙的街上等死吧，或者去竞技场杀了绮克萝丝也行。但就算你真的杀了她，你还是死路一条。”
languages.original_text: "I will leave the Anatomical Opera and withdraw to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The Wyches won't dare to settle their scores under the eye of my patrons, so the Kabal's valuable servant is safe from their ire. As for you... Go out into the streets of the Chasm and die. Or go to the arena and try to kill Keykeross. Even if you succeed, you will still die."

traits.locale_text: “我打算离开解剖歌剧院，撤回狂风阴谋团的尖塔。巫灵教派的人不敢在我的庇护主眼皮底下算账。我是狂风阴谋团的重要仆人，我不会遭到他们的袭击。至于你……你就去裂隙的街上等死吧，或者去竞技场杀了绮克萝丝也行。但就算你真的杀了她，你还是死路一条。”

languages.text: "Ich werde die Anatomische Oper verlassen und mich in den Turm des plündernden Sturms zurückziehen. Die Hekatari werden es nicht wagen, ihre Rechnungen unter den Augen meiner Gönner zu begleichen, daher ist der wertvolle Diener der Kabale vor ihrem Zorn sicher. Und was Euch angeht ... Geht in die Straßen der Kluft und sterbt. Oder geht in die Arena und versucht, Keykeross zu töten. Selbst, wenn Ihr Erfolg habt, werdet Ihr sterben."
languages.original_text: "I will leave the Anatomical Opera and withdraw to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The Wyches won't dare to settle their scores under the eye of my patrons, so the Kabal's valuable servant is safe from their ire. As for you... Go out into the streets of the Chasm and die. Or go to the arena and try to kill Keykeross. Even if you succeed, you will still die."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde die Anatomische Oper verlassen und mich in den Turm des plündernden Sturms zurückziehen. Die Hekatari werden es nicht wagen, ihre Rechnungen unter den Augen meiner Gönner zu begleichen, daher ist der wertvolle Diener der Kabale vor ihrem Zorn sicher. Und was Euch angeht ... Geht in die Straßen der Kluft und sterbt. Oder geht in die Arena und versucht, Keykeross zu töten. Selbst, wenn Ihr Erfolg habt, werdet Ihr sterben."

languages.text: «Abandonaré la Ópera Anatómica y me retiraré a la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora. Amparado por mis patrones, las brujas no se atreverán a vengarse, y así el valioso sirviente de la Kábala estará a salvo de su cólera. En cuanto a ti... Adéntrate por las calles del Abismo y muere en el intento. O ve a la arena e intenta matar a Keykeross. Aunque lo consigas, morirás de todas formas».
languages.original_text: "I will leave the Anatomical Opera and withdraw to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The Wyches won't dare to settle their scores under the eye of my patrons, so the Kabal's valuable servant is safe from their ire. As for you... Go out into the streets of the Chasm and die. Or go to the arena and try to kill Keykeross. Even if you succeed, you will still die."

traits.locale_text: «Abandonaré la Ópera Anatómica y me retiraré a la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora. Amparado por mis patrones, las brujas no se atreverán a vengarse, y así el valioso sirviente de la Kábala estará a salvo de su cólera. En cuanto a ti... Adéntrate por las calles del Abismo y muere en el intento. O ve a la arena e intenta matar a Keykeross. Aunque lo consigas, morirás de todas formas».

languages.text: 「アナトミカル・オペラを去り、リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔に引き揚げる。ウィッチには私のパトロンの目の前で決着をつける勇気はないだろうから、陰謀団の大事な従者たちは彼らの怒りから逃れることができるだろう。お前は…裂け目の通りに出て死ぬがいい。あるいは闘技場に行ってキーケロスを殺してみろ。たとえ成功したとしても、死ぬことに変わりはないがな」
languages.original_text: "I will leave the Anatomical Opera and withdraw to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The Wyches won't dare to settle their scores under the eye of my patrons, so the Kabal's valuable servant is safe from their ire. As for you... Go out into the streets of the Chasm and die. Or go to the arena and try to kill Keykeross. Even if you succeed, you will still die."

traits.locale_text: 「アナトミカル・オペラを去り、リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔に引き揚げる。ウィッチには私のパトロンの目の前で決着をつける勇気はないだろうから、陰謀団の大事な従者たちは彼らの怒りから逃れることができるだろう。お前は…裂け目の通りに出て死ぬがいい。あるいは闘技場に行ってキーケロスを殺してみろ。たとえ成功したとしても、死ぬことに変わりはないがな」

languages.text: "Anatomi Operası'nı terk ediyorum ve Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'ne çekiliyorum. Hamilerimin gözetimi altındayken Viçler gelip hesap sormaya cüret edemezler, Kabal'ın değerli hizmetkârları, onların hiddeti karşısında güvendedir. Size gelince. Yarık'ın sokaklarına çıkın ve geberin. Veya arenaya gidip Keykeross'u öldürmeye çalışın. Başarılı olsanız bile yine de öleceksiniz."
languages.original_text: "I will leave the Anatomical Opera and withdraw to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The Wyches won't dare to settle their scores under the eye of my patrons, so the Kabal's valuable servant is safe from their ire. As for you... Go out into the streets of the Chasm and die. Or go to the arena and try to kill Keykeross. Even if you succeed, you will still die."

traits.locale_text: "Anatomi Operası'nı terk ediyorum ve Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'ne çekiliyorum. Yarık'ın sokaklarına çıkın ve geberin. Veya arenaya gidip Keykeross'u öldürmeye çalışın. Başarılı olsanız bile yine de öleceksiniz."
